channel.title: Port
channel.description: Ok, I just got a source, but the port it uses if 5555 and I dont like that, cause most people like it to be 43594. How can I change it to where it is 43594?? I've never had to deal with this so dont call me a nub.

item.title: Port
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

[quote=“slump40, post:3, topic:151592”]Wrong.

Open Server.Java and search for public static int serverlistenerPort = 5555;
And change it to 43594

Then compile.[/quote]
ffs,why did i put client…Ahh…

Read full topic

item.title: Port
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

[quote=“rs w00dcut, post:2, topic:151592”]Open client.java
Search for “5555”
Change it to 43594 and compile.
CHEERS[/quote]

Wrong.

Open Server.Java and search for public static int serverlistenerPort = 5555;
And change it to 43594

Then compile.

Read full topic

item.title: Port
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

Open client.java
Search for “5555”
Change it to 43594 and compile.
CHEERS
